thread.title: Man's kiss cam proposal goes horribly, horribly wrong
thread.title_full: Man's kiss cam proposal goes horribly, horribly wrong

author: Christina Careaga
title: Man's kiss cam proposal goes horribly, horribly wrong
text:
There are many reasons a person may not love a kiss cam proposal - and one is that you may just never see the ring.
Saturday's Atlanta Hawks home game gave us serious dÃ©jÃ  vu when a man decided to get down on one knee and ask his girlfriend to marry him during the team's kiss cam segment. Unfortunately for the couple, shortly after popping the question, the ring dropped into the stands.
SEE ALSO: Fan brilliantly trolls Kiss Cam by smooching his beer, not his girl
A fan tried to propose to his girlfriend last night...and then this happened: ðŸ˜¬ðŸ˜¬ pic.twitter.com/tCgr0A3ItE
â€” Atlanta Hawks (@ATLHawks) January 22, 2017
A friend or fan enthusiastically patted the proposer on the back to congratulate him, causing the ring to pop right out of his hand and onto the ground. The pair and their surrounding Hawks fans jumped out of their seats to search the stands for the ring, but whether or not it was found still remains unclear.
While many are calling the proposal staged based on the quick reaction of the crowd surrounding the pair, we can't help but feel bad for the heartbroken guy.
Take note, fans: kiss cam proposals can be dangerous.
BONUS: Guy emotionally proposes to GF at Coldplay gig and we sense a theme
